Commentary.ab: Y10.16g at̰cit̰] Bartholomae at̰cit̰ as part., but usually after yat̰cit̰. This construction with the meaning "und zwar" (sic) should be a hapax. Pirart, 2003, p. 102, n. 302 suggests originally *ā́ cit, ā + abl. aɱāt̰.
Y10.16g mańiuuā̊] Geldner; Kellens, Pirart (Bartholomae) mainiuuā̊.

Parallels.ab: humatahe aɱi dušmatahe nōit̰ aɱi hūxtahe aɱi dužūxtahe nōit̰ aɱi huuarštahe aɱi dužuuarštahe nōit̰ aɱi; ~ Y0.6, Y12.2 aibī.gairiiā daiϑē vīspā humatācā hūxtācā huuarštācā paitī.riciiā daiϑē vīspā dušmatācā dužūxtācā dužuuarštācā; ~ VrS64.6, VrS64.7, VrS71.5, VrS71.6 framərəiti humatanąmca hūxtanąmca huuarštanąmca paitištātə̄e dušmatanąmca dužūxtanąmca dužuuarštanąmca.
